com.sponsorpay.sdk.android.advertiser
Class SponsorPayAdvertiser

java.lang.Object
  com.sponsorpay.sdk.android.advertiser.SponsorPayAdvertiser
All Implemented Interfaces:
AdvertiserCallbackSender.APIResultListener
public class SponsorPayAdvertiser
extends java.lang.Object
implements AdvertiserCallbackSender.APIResultListener

Provides convenience calls to run the Advertiser callback request. Manages the state of the SDK determining whether a successful response to the callback request has been already received since the application was installed in the host device.

It's implemented as a singleton, and its public methods are static.

register

public static void register(android.content.Context context,
                            java.lang.String overrideAppId)
Deprecated. This method will be removed from a future version of the SDK. Use register(Context) instead.

Triggers the Advertiser callback. If passed a non-null and non-empty Application ID, it will be used. Otherwise the Application ID will be retrieved from the value defined in the host application's Android Manifest XML file.

Parameters:
context - Host application context.
overrideAppId - The App ID to use.

register

public static void register(android.content.Context context,
                            java.lang.String overrideAppId,
                            java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> customParams)
Deprecated. This method will be removed from a future version of the SDK. Use register(Context, Map) instead.

Triggers the Advertiser callback. If passed a non-null and non-empty Application ID, it will be used. Otherwise the Application ID will be retrieved from the value defined in the host application's Android Manifest XML file.

Parameters:
context - Host application context.
overrideAppId - The App ID to use.
customParams - A map of extra key/value pairs to add to the request URL.

registerWithDelay

public static void registerWithDelay(android.content.Context context,
                                     int delayMin)
Deprecated. We no longer support delayed callbacks. This method will be removed from a future version of the SDK

Triggers the Advertiser callback after the specified delay has passed. Will retrieve the App ID from the value defined in the host application's Android Manifest XML file.

Parameters:
context - Host application context.
delayMin - The delay in minutes for triggering the Advertiser callback.

registerWithDelay

public static void registerWithDelay(android.content.Context context,
                                     int delayMin,
                                     java.lang.String overrideAppId)
Deprecated. We no longer support delayed callbacks. This method will be removed from a future version of the SDK

Triggers the Advertiser callback after the specified delay has passed. Will use the provided App ID instead of trying to retrieve the one defined in the host application's manifest.

Parameters:
context - Host application context.
delayMin - The delay in minutes for triggering the Advertiser callback.
overrideAppId - The App ID to use.

registerWithDelay

public static void registerWithDelay(android.content.Context context,
                                     int delayMin,
                                     java.lang.String overrideAppId,
                                     java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> customParams)
Deprecated. We no longer support delayed callbacks. This method will be removed from a future version of the SDK

Triggers the Advertiser callback after the specified delay has passed. Will use the provided App ID instead of trying to retrieve the one defined in the host application's manifest.

Parameters:
context - Host application context.
delayMin - The delay in minutes for triggering the Advertiser callback.
overrideAppId - The App ID to use.
customParams - Map of custom key/values to add to the parameters on the requests to the REST API.
